roomfull.content: You cannot join this lobby. The lobby is full.

notowner.content: You cannot change lobby settings. You are not the lobby owner.

alreadyjoinedspectator.content: You are already spectator in this lobby.

nospectator.content: You cannot join this lobby as spectator. This lobby does not allow spectators to join.

roomclosedspectator.content: The room was closed because no non-spectator were left.

invalidsession.content: Your sessions seems to be outdated. Sorry.

notartist.content: You cannot draw on the canvas. You are currently not the artist.
